africa.descriptionShort: It is one of the greatest small cities in the world. From canals to world-famous museums and historical sights, it is one of the most romantic and beautiful cities. Canal cruises are a popular way to see the city from the perspective of its canals. It is very unique for its large and untouched historic center. It has a rich ...
africa.description: It is one of the greatest small cities in the world. From canals to world-famous museums and historical sights, it is one of the most romantic and beautiful cities. Canal cruises are a popular way to see the city from the perspective of its canals. It is very unique for its large and untouched historic center. It has a rich architectural history, dominated by water. It is a meeting point for all different cultures around the world and has a welcoming attitude towards visitors. Well known for its museums, red light district, coffee shops but also the great variety of eating & drinking place and night life. It even claims to be the ‘Gay capital of Europe’. Therefore a lot of hotel and hostels can be found on different locations, value for money and ambience.
